characters: A male cyclist wearing a black jacket and a yellow helmet, approximately 30 years old.
summary: The vehicle is approaching an intersection with several large trucks parked on the right side, obstructing the view. At approximately 8.0s, a male cyclist wearing a black jacket and a yellow helmet suddenly appears from behind a large white truck on the left side of the road, crossing the street. The cyclist's sudden appearance from behind the truck constitutes a ghost probing situation, as the driver has minimal time to react to avoid a potential collision.
actions: The vehicle is approaching an intersection and decelerating, likely in preparation to make a turn or stop at the intersection. The deceleration is a safety measure due to the limited visibility caused by the parked trucks. The vehicle is slowing down to assess the situation at the intersection.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A male cyclist wearing a black jacket and a yellow helmet, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly emerging from behind a large white truck and crossing the street. 2) Left side: A large white truck, approximately 7 meters away, creating visual obstruction that hides the cyclist until emergence.
